remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每個功能區控制項繼承屬性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果設定屬性，則不會顯示功能區的增強型工具提示; 將改為顯示標準的工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon's enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
